text: (jo) cheezen (beej vagairah) zameen mein daakhil huee hai aur jo cheez (darakht vagairah) isamen se nikalatee hai aur jo cheez (paanee vagairah) aasaaman se naazil hotee hai aur jo cheez (nazaaraat pharishte vagairah) us par chadhatee hai (sab) ko jaanata hai aur vahee bada bakhshane vaala hai
